html: Quack is a Unity3D game made for the Global Game Jam 2019 with theme "What home means to you?". The game consists in a happy chicken that wants to build a new home for it's children. You have to collect sticks and group them in top of the main tree to make a nice nest. This game was developed within 12 hours.
title: Quack
